definitions.definition: a microorganism, especially one that causes disease.
examples: microbe, microorganism, bacillus, bacterium, virus; bug this detergent kills germs

definitions.definition: a portion of an organism capable of developing into a new one or part of one.
the embryo in a cereal grain or other plant seed.
examples: embryo, bud; Moreseed, spore, ovule; egg, ovum "a fertilized germ"Moreseed, spore, ovule; egg, ovum a fertilized germ

definitions.definition: an initial stage from which something may develop.
examples: the germ of a brilliant idea
